Articles.Content:
does anyone have any tips for accurate reentry?

im trying to hit the space center using my space plane that can just barley get into orbit and deorbit, so it needs to be as accurate as the space shuttle, but its hard to predict where your going to slow down on a low orbit.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=7485.0

This should do it. Your welcome.

Note: its an old thread; don\'t go posting in it ya hear?
Usually, my technique is just getting the ap to down to about 10KM above the surface, a few killomeres ahead of my target.
